name: Umpicado
description:
[Pizza Jam game theme was 7 deadly sins, choose one. Chosen sin: Sloth]

[Game works with a  single button controls. You can use any button.]

You are about to step into the shoes of a great hero Umpicado and embark on an amazing adventure!

Blow the dust off your adventure gloves, put on your adventure goggles and strap yourself in, this will be a wild ride.

"As many endings as there are choices to make." - Mr. Cuckatoo, Parrot Games Journal

"Adventure game has never given me such intense feelings." - Mrs. Labrador, Shelter Press

"Umpicado is a man of my heart." - Garfield
